title.rendered: TTE introduces cutting-edge Indoor Air Quality (IAQ) solutions to its offerings

content.rendered:
TTE has stepped up its air purification drive with the introduction of the award-winning REME HALO® in-duct air purifier. The new product will take in-building air purification to the next level through revolutionary REME-PHI–CELL® technology. The technology is effective against all three categories of indoor air pollutants, namely Particulates, Microbial and Gases, and has been thoroughly tested on airborne and surface bacteria and viruses, such as SARS-COV-2 (Covid-19), MRSA and e-coli.

REME Halo is a patented product of RGF Environmental Group, Inc. USA and is proven against outbreaks like SARS-COV-2, H1N1, Tuberculosis and Swine Flu. It successfully eliminates Volatile Organic Compounds as well as bacterial and fungal growth in the environment.
